nav.class: offset-by-four eleven columns alpha omega megamenu mega_menu

h2.span:
​APS Connected Learning allows us to work with students and families through an online learning environment.
We provide resources, training and lessons that engage students, inform families and support our teachers.

div.p: Students click here to learn how to get started with Google Classroom, find important resources, and get up-to-date information from the district.
Families may have questions about online learning. Our family resources help connect families to supports they need for student success.
Return to the APS home page for general district information, view the calendar, find information on your school and access important resources.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15.3333px; letter-spacing: 0.3px;
font-size: 11.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;

p.span: The toolkit supports educators in planning, designing, and implementing online lessons through the use of a variety of virtual communication tools.
